name: ISO/IEC 27001:2022
overview: Information Security Management Systems - International standard for establishing, implementing, maintaining, and continually improving an ISMS. Contains 93 controls in 4 categories: Organizational, People, Physical, and Technological. High relevance for EU/UK operations.

4.1.use_cases: Strategic planning, Risk assessment, Compliance mapping

4.2.description: Understanding the needs and expectations of interested parties
4.2.examples: Stakeholder analysis, Legal requirements mapping, Customer expectations
4.2.use_cases: Compliance management, Stakeholder engagement, Legal alignment

5.1.examples: Executive commitment, Resource allocation, Policy endorsement
